message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.  I'm asking for $20,000 for it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $20,000 represents the value I place on this product, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me halfway at $16,000?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, $16,000 is still a bit too high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $13,000. I'm willing to make a serious commitment to buy the product, but I need to stay within my budget.
